title: Song of the prairie
brief_description: An animated puppet satire on the American western genre. Amusing stereotypes of typical characters from cowboy films which range from the whisky-swilling stagecoach driver and evil villain to the innocent heroine and singing hero. Music by Jan Rychlik.
